title: TOTALLY RENOVATED PRISTINE PROPERTY! 3 Bed 1 Bath PETS OK A REAL GEM!!
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 302360998', 'Rent: $2,800 / Month', 'Beds: 3', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 07/15/2022', 'Pet: Negotiable', 'Parking:: off-street parking', '****AVAILABLE NOW****', '**Desirable East Watertown Neighborhood Location....Crawford St**', '**Spacious 1st Floor Property....1,125 S/F**', '**3 Bedrooms w/Good Closet Space**', '**Eat-in-Kitchen w/NEW STAINLESS APPLIANCES...', 'Gas Stove...H/W Floor**', '**Refinished H/W Floors**', '**Replacement Windows**', '**NEW BATH**', '**2 Built In A/C Units**', '**W/D Hook-Ups**', '**Off Street Parking 3 Cars**', '**Large Deck w/Full Sun**', '!!!!!', '****THIS IS A FINE RENTAL PROPERTY...', 'UNDER MARKET...RESPONSIVE OWNER**!!!!', '1st Month, Security & Full Fee Required.', 'Please Contact Frank 617 549 1526 Mobile', 'FEATURES', 'Dishwasher', 'Disposal', 'Eat-in Kitchen', 'HARDWOOD FLOOR IN KITCHEN', 'LARGE DECK', 'New & Refinished H/W Floors', 'NEW BATHROOM', 'New Dishwasher-Stainless', 'New Fridge-Stainless', 'NEW STAINLESS APPLIANCES', 'Off Street Parking 3 Cars', 'PET FRIENDLY', 'Refinished Floors', 'Responsive Owner', 'Spacious 1st Floor Property', 'Updated Bath', 'W/D Hook Ups', 'Frank M.', '617 549-1526', 'The Rental Group', 'Towns Arlington, Medford, Somerville,Watertown,Belmont,Winchester,Lexington,Woburn and Surrounding.', 'Prices subject to change depending on move date and/or number of occupants.', ' Some pictures may be of comparable unit.']
